body:
Given a package and one of its dependencies, it would be nice to have a simple way to find only the part of the dependency graph that connects them. This is useful for common queries, such as 
"why am I building perl?"

`spack graph` provides all of the info, but for large graphs its hard to follow all of the lines.

This could be done an option spack graph, or be its own command, etc.
title: option to narrow graph to locate source of specific dependencies
